name: Chill Out (itch) (AlexEnglish)
description:
Theme: All for one and one for all

Maya for Modelling, Clip Studio for Concepting and character textures, Substance Painter for texturing Assets, Substance Designer for tileables, Unreal as game Engine

The game is unfinished. It was conceptually supposed to be a fire emblem type game with a unifying system for attacks and/or health. Isometric strategy combat game.
